sections.purpose: To view and capture digital images of microorganisms and microscopic structures.
sections.scope: Applicable to teaching, documentation, and analysis in Microbiology.
procedure: Connect the digital microscope to a computer or display as per manufacturer instructions.
Switch ON the microscope and associated imaging software.
Place the prepared slide on the stage and focus using the live image on screen.
Adjust brightness, contrast, and magnification digitally or via controls.
Capture still images or videos as required and save them with proper file names.
After observation, remove the slide and clean any oil from objectives.
Shut down the software and power OFF the microscope.
Cover the instrument to protect it from dust.
precautions: Avoid sudden unplugging of USB or power cables while the system is running.
Use only recommended cleaning agents for lenses and sensors.
Ensure sufficient ventilation for any built-in light sources.
Protect the instrument from power surges using a stabilizer or UPS.
Do not touch the camera sensor directly.
